name: spo-group-permission-report
title: Get permission group report of a site.
shortDescription: The scripts get group permission report of site and each list on the site and prints it to console and also sends it as an adaptive card to Teams channel specified by webhook.
longDescription: The scripts get group permission report of site and each list on the site and prints it to console and also sends it as an adaptive card to Teams channel specified by webhook.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
